title: You can go a long way!
creator_credit: Donald Wilder and San Life Assurance Co of Canada
brief_description: Designed to allow students to explore, in their own way, the reasons why it is wise to finish school, and get as much training and education as possible before looking for a job. Tells in a light way what parents and teachers sometimes knock themselves out trying to prove: that competition is keen in the bread-and -butter world and that the best jobs go to the candidate with the best qualifications.
